result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kaitlyn J. Goldsmith

defendant.name: Goldsmith, Kaitlyn J.
defendant.address: N3267 River Bend Road, Peshtigo, WI 54157

records.addlTxt: Atty Jevon Jaconi appointed as dean atty for Deft - repayment of $125 per mth comm 11-1-2022

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
9:33 AM Defendant Kaitlyn J. Goldsmith in court.  Attorney Morow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Court inquires on atty.
Deft provides Dean form to the Court.
Deft sworn in.
Court reviews form with Deft.
Atty Jaconi is present and is heard - will take the case.
DA provides a copy of the Dean form.
Deft to repay Dean fees at $125 per month beginning 11-01-2022. 
Court schedules with parties.
9:38 AM
Status conference scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

10:02 AM Defendant Kaitlyn J. Goldsmith appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Atty Spansail is present from PD's office for bond purposes only.
Copy of Criminal Complaint.
ADA heard on bond recommendations.
Atty Spansail heard on bond.
Court imposes $500 cash bail w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances illegal in WI today w/o a valid Rx, no entry into any bars, taverns, or restaurants that serve alcohol.
Deft to contact the Public Defender's office today.
Court schedules with parties.
10:04 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
